member.name: T:Dundas.Olap.Data.Mdx.MdxQueryBuilder
member.summary: Helper class that builds ADOMD MDX query string.
member.remarks: method takes query objects and returns back an MDX query string.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Mdx.MdxQueryBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Default public constructor.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Mdx.MdxQueryBuilder.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Public constructor.
member.param: True if data provider supports selection of multiple dimension members on the Slicer axis.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Mdx.MdxQueryBuilder.GetCommandText(Dundas.Olap.Data.CubeDataSchema,Dundas.Olap.Data.AxisDescriptorCollection,Dundas.Olap.Data.AxisDescriptor,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates ADOMD MDX command string based on requested dimension members and axes.
member.param: Cube data schema.
An object that describes requested axis.
An object that describes the slicer axis.
A string value that describes the cube name of the command.
A bool value that determines whether empty cells are shown in the command.
member.returns: A string that contains the result MDX query text.

member.summary: Gets axis set string of the query.
member.param: An to get the set string for.
True if this is a slicer axis.
member.returns: String that contains specified axis set text.

member.summary: Gets sorting and filtering command text for the axis set.
member.param: An to get the set string for.
A string that contains current axis set text.
member.returns: A string that contains original axis set text plus all the filtering and sorting commands.

member.name: T:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider
member.summary: Multidimensional data provider that uses ADOMD to connect and retrieve data from the multidimensional data source.

member.summary: Object constructor.

member.summary: Object constructor used by ISerializable interface.
member.param: A object that represents the serialized information to be loaded.
A object.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.IsTopLevelMember(Dundas.Olap.Data.Member)
member.summary: Checks if the given member associated with top level.
member.param: member to be checked
member.returns: true if member is top level

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.CheckConnection
member.summary: Checks the ADOMD connection status and tries to reconnect in case the connection is broken or closed.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.Connect
member.summary: Connects to the data source using the current connection string.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.Disconnect(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disconnects from the data source and optionally disposes the connection object.
member.param: True if the connection object should be disposed.

member.summary: Creates new dimension member class base on the ADOMD member object.
member.param: ADOMD member object.
New member dimension level.
New member parent member.
Indicates that the member is created from the cellset.
member.returns: Newly created dimension member object.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.GetUserConnectionString
member.summary: Returns connection string with user.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.EnsureConnectionCache
member.summary: Ensures at least one open connection. The feature works only in non-interactive applications such as Web in order to keep connection pool live.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.GetAvailableCatalogNames
member.summary: Gets an array of available catalog names.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.GetCubesInfo
member.summary: Gets the data provider cube information collection.
member.returns: A object that contains a collection of cube information objects or null if multiple cubes are not supported.

member.summary: Gets the data schema for the specified cube.
member.param: A string that contains the cube name to get the data schema for.
member.returns: A object for the specified cube.

member.summary: Gets the string value of the ADOMD object property.
member.param: ADOMD object properties collection.
Name of the property to get.
Default value of the property returned by this function if the property with specified name is not found.
member.returns: Property string value or string passed in defaultValue parameter if not found.

member.summary: Gets integer value of the ADOMD object property.
member.param: ADOMD object properties collection.
Name of the property to get.
Default value of the property returned by this function if the property with a specified name is not found.
member.returns: Property integer value or value passed in defaultValue parameter if not found.

member.summary: Gets dimension type using "DIMENSION_TYPE" property.

member.returns: DimensionType value.

member.summary: Gets level type using the "LEVEL_TYPE" property.

member.returns: LevelType value.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.GetLevelMembers(Dundas.Olap.Data.Level)
member.summary: Gets dimension level members on-demand. This method is used for optimization purposes when the data provider supports MembersOnDemand.
member.param: Dimension level to get the members for.
member.returns: Collection of child members.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.GetParentMember(Dundas.Olap.Data.Member)
member.summary: Gets the parent member of the specified member on-demand.
member.param: Dimension member to get the parent member for.
member.returns: Parent member or null.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.GetChildMembers(Dundas.Olap.Data.Member)
member.summary: Gets child members of the specified member on-demand. This method is used for optimization purposes when the data provider supports MembersOnDemand.
member.param: Dimension member to get the child members for.
member.returns: Collection of child members.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.ExecuteCellSet(System.String,Dundas.Olap.Data.CubeDataSchema,System.Boolean,Dundas.Olap.Data.AxisDescriptorCollection,Dundas.Olap.Data.AxisDescriptor)
member.summary: Retrieves multidimensional data from the provider.
member.param: A string value that represents the cube name to retrieve data from.
Cube data schema.
True if only non-empty cells should be retrieved.
An object that contains a collection of requested AxisDescriptors.
A slicer object.
member.returns: A result object.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.ExecuteCellSet(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves multidimensional data from the provider.
member.param: A string value that represents the cube name to retrieve data from.
True if only non-empty cells should be retrieved.
MDX query string.
member.returns: A result object.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.GetCell(Dundas.Olap.Data.CellSet,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Retrieves a single cell using an index for each data axis.
member.param: A object to get the cell from.
Array of indexes for each axes.
member.returns: Requested object.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.Close
member.summary: Closes the connection to the database.
member.remarks: It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. An application can call Close more than one time without generating an exception.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.Open
member.summary: Opens the connection to the database.
member.remarks: This method can be called to ensure that connection with the database is established.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.System#Runtime#Serialization#ISerializable#GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Populates a SerializationInfo with the data needed to serialize the target object.
member.param: The SerializationInfo to populate with data.
The destination (see StreamingContext) for this serialization.
member.exception: The caller does not have the required permission.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes data provider object.
member.param: True if both managed and unmanaged resources should be disposed.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.CurrentCellSet
member.summary: Gets current cellset.
member.value: A that contains the last retrieved data from the data provider.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the ADOMD connection string.

member.summary: This member overrides property

member.summary: This member overrides the property.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.UseImpersonation
member.summary: Indicates that current identity information should be included in connection pool.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.SupportsMultipleSlicerMemberSelection
member.summary: Checks if data provider supports selection of multiple dimension members on the Slicer axis.
member.value: Returns true if multiple member selection is supported on the Slicer axis.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.IsConnected
member.summary: Checks if data provider is currently connected to the data source.
member.value: True if data provider is currently connected.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.SupportsMembersOnDemand
member.summary: Gets the flag that indicates if the data provider supports on-demand member retrieval.
member.remarks: Retrieving metadata about all the members in the cube can be a time consuming process. This property indicates if the data provider can retrieve members metadata only on-demand.
member.value: A boolean value that indicates if the data provider supports on-demand member retrieval.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.SupportsCubes
member.summary: Gets the flag that indicates if the data provider supports supports multiple cubes.
member.value: A boolean value that indicates if the data provider supports multiple cubes.

member.name: P:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.CatalogName
member.summary: Gets current catalog name from the data provider.
member.value: A string value that contains current catalog name.

member.name: T:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.ControlDesigner
member.summary: OLAP Manager Web control designer.

member.name: M:Dundas.Olap.Data.Adomd.AdomdDataProvider.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml
member.summary: Gets the design time HTML source that present the control.
member.returns: HTML source as a string.
